name: [DEMO] Lost Sheep Cafe
description:
Welcome to the Lost Sheep Café! A place where those who find themselves lost can go to rest.

On a snowy night Kai and Amelia find themselves in the Café. What will they learn about themselves and about how they see the world.

This game was originally made for the 2022 Winter Game Jam Hosted by  Crystal Game Works and Maricu.

Jam Credits 
Co-authors - CandyCornSkull, PeanutPiano

Character artist - CandyCornSkull

Background Artist - Dalishous

Writers - Asclepius, Moonlight, PeanutPiano

Music -Pinefall (https://twitter.com/Pinefall_)
